actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for optometrists' services and eye-glasses.

summary.text: Provides payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for optometrists' services and eyeglasses pursuant to title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for optometrists' services and eye-glasses.
